content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (1.0, 1.0)) with a current status of EntityStatus.WORKING. It has a fuel source of coal (full) and is processing iron ore.

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.5, -50.5)
Consists of the following activities:
- Harvesting iron ore from the specified location.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has available inventory space before attempting to insert items. The last error indicates that the furnace was full, preventing the insertion of coal.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
